creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black, blue, pink, green; pounded indigo with embroidered square using red, green, blue and white metal; outlined in bright blue; above the square are wide heavily embroidered pink, green and black bands; black band extends into straps; animal tail in center; loosly attached additional square above main carrier; green, orange and red heavily embroidered edges, corners and center with silver paper outlining; attached with three red loops
medium: Cotton, silver paper, animal tail; needlework
title: Baby Carrier
